about_the_game:
This is just an opportunity to support the developer with a small amount of money if you like the game.
This DLC includes the original project of the game. The game engine used is Unreal Engine 4.27.2. Can be used for familiarization, modification, and anything you want. All sound files have been removed from the project, because they were bought on marketplace and I have no right to distribute them in their native form.
